Bunstuffe is right, no 1080P films are 1920 x 1080 because of the black bars at the top and bottom. Commonly the resolution refers to the actual picture excluding the bars so 1920  x 816 is about right. Having said that Francisco is right also - if you are expecting Blu-Ray quality sound and vision, you are not going to get in in a 1GB file. In that case look elsewhere.
